summary: Unit tests that validate the attribute comparison solvers (greater‑than, greater‑or‑equal, less‑than, less‑or‑equal) employed in Terraform infrastructure graph checks, covering simple literals, unrendered values, and mixed operator scenarios across different graph implementations.
business_intent: Guarantee that the comparison logic used in Terraform policy checks works correctly, preventing false positives/negatives in security and compliance scanning of infrastructure code.
